actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to require States to pass along to public assistance recipients who are entitled to social security benefits the 1972 increase in such benefits, either by disregarding it in determining their need for assistance or otherwise.

summary.text: Requires the States to pass along to public assistance recipients who are entitled to social security benefits the full amount of the 1972 increase in such benefits, either by disregarding it in determining their need for assistance or otherwise.

titles.title: A bill to require States to pass along to public assistance recipients who are entitled to social security benefits the 1972 increase in such benefits, either by disregarding it in determining their need for assistance or otherwise.
